text: Austin William Russell Lewis (born 5 December 1932) is an Australian politician. He is a member of the Liberal Party. He served as a Senator for Victoria from 1976 to 1993. Lewis was born in Richmond, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria. He married Wilma Lawrey in 1956. The couple had four children. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Politicians from Melbourne
title: Austin Lewis (politician)
